Package BusinessLogic.CommuteManager

Class CommuteDatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • BusinessLogic.CommuteManager.CommuteDatabaseManager

  • public class CommuteDatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a databasemanager to trains. Data is kept in a SQLite database in root folder. This class is also ready to save all data to remote database :)

    • Method Detail

      • createTable

        private void createTable​()
        This method is invoked whenever constructor is called to make sure the table is correct and exists

      • addNewTrain

        boolean addNewTrain​(Train train)
        Adds a new train to database
        Parameters:
        train - train to add to the connected database
        Returns:
        true if it was successful, otherwise false.

      • updateTrain

        boolean updateTrain​(Train oldTrain,
                    Train newTrain)
        Update a train in the connected database. It will basically erase the old train and replace it with the new train. New train will inherit all properties except for the serialization key.
        Parameters:
        oldTrain - train to be updated
        newTrain - train to replace the old train
        Returns:
        return true if it was successful

      • getTrainsByProperty

        public java.util.ArrayList<Train> getTrainsByProperty​(java.lang.String property,
                                                      java.lang.String value)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Retieve a list of trains that match a single query. For example return trains that depart(property) from "Helsinki"(value)
        Parameters:
        property - a database property to be selected ...
        value - ... with this value
        Returns:
        A list of trains that matched the query in the database
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - resultset.getString can throw this
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - also a property of resultset

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • generateRandomTrain

        static Train generateRandomTrain​()
        All-inclusive package to generate a random train. Generates a random train with random properties, random cabins and random seats.
        Returns:
        train that was generated

      • generateRandomCabinet

        private static Cabinet generateRandomCabinet​()
        Generates a random cabinet. With random seats. Neat.
        Returns:
        Randomly filled cabin

      • fillDatabaseWithRandomTrains

        public void fillDatabaseWithRandomTrains​(CommuteDatabaseManager cdm,
                                         int count)
        Adds random trains to database with specified amount.
        Parameters:
        cdm - the database manager for trains
        count - how many random trains to add

      • reserveSeat

        public void reserveSeat​(Train oldTrain,
                        int cabinSelectorIndex,
                        int seatSelectorIndex,
                        boolean toBeReserved)
        This method marks a seat as reserved and saves it to database. The process is a little bit complicated since serialization needs a new train object. New train object will be filled with old train properties except for the seat to be reserved. To avoid hacking into reserved seats, this can be expanded to have an exception.
        Parameters:
        oldTrain - train to be modified
        cabinSelectorIndex - cabin to be modified
        seatSelectorIndex - seat to be marked as taken
        toBeReserved - true to make new seat reserved
